channel.title: RexPS|Unique Home|15+ Bosses|Perfected PK|Friendly Staff| Custom Items|All Skill
channel.description:
[b]Please download the pics if ur interested to see what server looks like :P . I couldn't figure out how to upload pics here, im new :/.[/b] [url=https://mega.co.nz/#F!3N5mlT7S!VVk2J0fUcVg3PFXBDtZ3VQ]https://mega.co.nz/#F!3N5mlT7S!VVk2J0fUcVg3PFXBDtZ3VQ[/url]
[b]
Join us:[/b] [url=http://rexrs.webs.com/]http://rexrs.webs.com/[/url]
[b]
Features:[/b]
- In-game features: - Perfected Pking, Switches, Specs, etc. - Level Point System, Once you have a certain amount u can buy rares! - PK Point System! - Not to Fast and not to slow leveling! - All Skills Working! - Fully working slayer! - Friendly staff! - Over 15 bosses for u pvmers! - Great combat. - EP System!! - No registering needed, which means you can play quickly! - 24/7 VPN - Custom Items - Fully Working Summoning!
- Website features: - VBulletin forums - Downloadble client! - More to come!
